root.name: Death Jr. II: Root of Evil
root.description: Death Jr. II: Root of Evil is the second game is the Death Jr. series appearing on the PSP and now premiering for its first time on the Nintendo Wii. The game released October 31, 2006 for the PSP and later on May 27, 2008 for the Wii. The Wii version features updated graphics, but the majority of the game is the same. It also supports split screen multiplayer where the second player may play as Pandora, Death Jr.'s (also known as DJ) friend who, simply put, will not take shit from anyone.
